Uses of Class
edu.rit.util.BitSet

  • Packages that use BitSet 
    Package Description
    edu.rit.pj2.vbl
    Package edu.rit.pj2.vbl contains general-purpose reduction variable classes that implement interface Vbl.
    edu.rit.util
    Package edu.rit.util contains general utility components.

    • Uses of BitSet in edu.rit.pj2.vbl

      Subclasses of BitSet in edu.rit.pj2.vbl 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BitSetVbl
      Class BitSetVbl provides a reduction variable for a set of integers from 0 to a given upper bound shared by multiple threads executing a ParallelStatement.
      static class  BitSetVbl.Intersection
      Class BitSetVbl.Intersection provides a reduction variable for a set of integers from 0 to a given upper bound, where the reduction operation is set intersection.
      static class  BitSetVbl.MaxSize
      Class BitSetVbl.MaxSize provides a reduction variable for a set of integers from 0 to a given upper bound, where the reduction operation is to keep the set with the largest size.
      static class  BitSetVbl.MinSize
      Class BitSetVbl.MinSize provides a reduction variable for a set of integers from 0 to a given upper bound, where the reduction operation is to keep the set with the smallest size.
      static class  BitSetVbl.Union
      Class BitSetVbl.Union provides a reduction variable for a set of integers from 0 to a given upper bound, where the reduction operation is set union.
